label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "The boy climbed the tree."? Choose one between A and B.
A: A cat got stuck in the tree.
B: A bird built a nest in the tree.

label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The vandals threw a rock at the window."? Choose one between A and B.
A: The window cracked.
B: The window fogged up.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The DJ turned the music on."? Choose one between A and B.
A: People left the party.
B: People began to dance.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "The man's clothes fit loosely."? Choose one between A and B.
A: He bought them on sale.
B: He lost weight.

sentence:

A: I walked upstairs.
B: I ran five miles.

sentence:

A: Factories increased their production.
B: Factories shut down.

sentence:

A: I leapt over the puddle.
B: I played in the puddle.
